member.name: IMFSampleGrabberSinkCallback.OnProcessSample
member.summary: Called when the sample-grabber sink receives a new media sample.
member.param: The major type that specifies the format of the data. For a list of possible values, see Major Media Types.
The presentation time for this sample, in 100-nanosecond units. If the sample does not have a presentation time, the value of this parameter is _I64_MAX.
The duration of the sample, in 100-nanosecond units. If the sample does not have a duration, the value of this parameter is _I64_MAX.
A pointer to a buffer that contains the sample data.
Size of the pSampleBuffer buffer, in bytes.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSampleGrabberSinkCallback.OnSetPresentationClock
member.summary: Called when the presentation clock is set on the sample-grabber sink.
member.param: Pointer to the presentation clock's interface.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFSampleGrabberSinkCallback.OnShutdown
member.summary: Called when the sample-grabber sink is shut down.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

member.name: IMFSampleGrabberSinkCallback
member.summary: Callback interface to get media data from the sample-grabber sink.
